name: Burt
tagline: Burt is currently; Sensors, various processing units, WiFly Wifi, motorized platform, CMUCam3, Netduino mini, dual MEMS microphones attached to the panning head frame, dual servos for camera pan and tilt, CIF typical CMOS based camera sensor (8 bits per pixel), 9 Degrees of freedom motion tracking processor.
body:
Burt
====

Burt is currently; Sensors, various processing units, WiFly Wifi, motorized platform, CMUCam3, Netduino mini, dual MEMS microphones attached to the panning head frame, dual servos for camera pan and tilt, CIF typical CMOS based camera sensor (8 bits per pixel), 9 Degrees of freedom motion tracking processor.

https://github.com/rcrowder/Burt/wiki

[![Burt portrait](/Burt.jpg?raw=true)]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
